data.message: Because of Facebook we were able to reach all of our friends and family members plus hundreds more in a very critical part of our lives to let them know and get prayers sent on behalf of my 15 year old grandson Jeremy Johnson who is fighting for his life. Thank you facebook for being there when we needed you the most! Thanks again to everyone who has responded as well - your prayers and well wishes have truly made a difference in our lives - God Bless you all! #StayStrong4Jeremy

replies.message: You're very welcome, Laurie! We'll be sending good vibes your way. -Sarah
